terms.definition: A centralized inventory of data assets that provides metadata, documentation, and search capabilities to help users discover and understand available data resources.
The tracking of data from its source through various transformations and processes to its final destination. Data lineage helps understand data flow and dependencies.
terms.markdown:
# ðŸš™ Vehicle Inventory Data Product (inventory.csv)

## Overview

`inventory.csv` is a governed **data product** representing the current and historical inventory of vehicles available for sale.  
It provides a consistent, queryable view of vehicle availability, condition, and pricing readiness across sellers.

This dataset is designed to act as a **source of truth for inventory state**, supporting analytics, reporting, and downstream sales pipelines.

---

## Product Details

Product Name: Vehicle Inventory  
File Name: inventory.csv  
Product Type: Analytical / Operational Dataset  
Data Domain: Automotive / Inventory  
Format: CSV  
Granularity: One row per vehicle  
Update Frequency: Batch / Near-Real-Time  
Owner: Data Engineering  
Status: Active  

---

## Schema

| Column Name | Type | Description |
|------------|------|-------------|
| Inventory_ID | String | Unique identifier for the inventory record |
| Car_Name | String | Vehicle make and model |
| Year | Integer | Year of manufacture |
| Listed_Price | Float | Current listed price |
| Condition | String | New, Used, Certified |
| Fuel_Type | String | Petrol, Diesel, CNG, Electric |
| Transmission | String | Manual or Automatic |
| Mileage_Kms | Integer | Total kilometers driven |
| Availability_Status | String | Available, Reserved, Sold |
| Last_Updated | Timestamp | Last inventory update time |

---

## Intended Use Cases

- Inventory availability tracking
- Pricing and markdown analysis
- Vehicle lifecycle monitoring
- Supply and demand analytics
- Operational dashboards

---

## Data Quality Notes

- `Inventory_ID` is unique and non-null.
- `Availability_Status` reflects the latest known state.
- Mileage values are non-negative.
- Late updates may occur for sold or reserved vehicles.

---

## Governance and Contracts

- This dataset follows schema-on-write principles.
- All schema changes require versioning.
- Downstream consumers must not infer fields beyond those documented.
- Time fields are standardized to UTC.

---

## Lineage and Relationships

```mermaid
flowchart LR
    A[Source Dealership Systems] --> B[inventory.csv]
    B --> C[Sales Transactions]
    B --> D[Pricing Analytics]
    B --> E[Inventory Dashboards]
